mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for McGlaughlin, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: McGlaughlin, John Patient Age: 40. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right fore arm. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va [Kernstown, Va]. Date Wounded: 1864/07/24. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dressings = Cold water, removed several pieces of bone - arm extended on splint. Good union of bones. Left the ward 3 times and went to Pompy Smash and once to Frostburg returned after drinking and disturbing the inmates of ward. Sent to duty for the service. . Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McGlaughlin, John
Gun shot fracture right fore arm
Private
B
Ireland
Hospital Number 3823
